channel.title: beach road fried toad
channel.description: welcome to easy's caprese salad lounge

item.title: Northdown Beach Video
item.description:
I installed the latest firmware udpate to my Sony a7iii (with much difficulty) to get the new intervalometer feature.

Using it to try out a new video format idea I have had. Put simply, a series of timelapse sequences - all from the same scene. But the timelapses are short interval, around 1 second, longer than your average burst mode yet short enough to cover 10-20 seconds of action.

Combining the nostalgic quality of photos and the immersive effect of video.

For this video the intervalometer was set to 1 second intervals for 20 seconds.
item.author: ronalds.vilcins@gmail.com (Ronalds Vilcins)

item.title: About this page
item.description:
Beach Road Fried Toad.

This is my corner of the internet. A place which isn’t social media to leave whatever I have been working on or doing, in a format which lends itself to archive more than attention.

Video, photo, family, home, travels, food, music, projects â€“ anything really.

Minimal text, minimal fluff. Some kind of diary, some kind of blog.

by easy.
